text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Once again, my name is Win Variation. 
Well, thank you for taking time out of your day for this.
choice_data_list: I should say the same! I'm looking forward to it.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I'll do my best! 
Okay, first I'll take the 1st lap easy and for the 2nd—

text_block_list.name: Journalist A
text_block_list.text:
Orfevre! Since entering Tracen Academy, 
have you changed at all!?

text_block_list.name: Journalist B
text_block_list.text:
In contrast to your pre-debut, your goal… 
have you decided on your dream!?

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: — You dare interrogate your king?

text_block_list.name: Journalists
text_block_list.text: Hya! I-I'm sorry—

The air grew cold. Even from afar, her voice resonated calmly. 
The atmosphere grew tense and made my skin crawl. Then—

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
…I laud your spirit. How amusing, 
I'll excuse it, just this once.

The atmosphere settled in that moment. 
…In a few words, she was able to change the mood.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: …You speak of "change" and "dreams".

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: My authority is absolute. There is nothing that can make this gold I wear fade… That is the law of this realm.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
—Therefore, 
Those who will soon live under my reign, heed me.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
I will march forth to establish my hegemony. 
The crown shall descend upon my head.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
This is no mere dream. 
——This is an inevitability.

They were entranced. Not a soul could open their mouths 
—What stood before their eyes, was a king.
—It was all overwhelming.
It wasn't just her charisma at work. Her running was the real deal. One time when she took to the turf, not a single soul caught up to her or got near her. She was clad in that type of aura.

…And the people that were there 
that day were captivated by her.

As though she was drawn in by her running, 
Win Variation took one step towards her.
Apparently, she couldn't take her eyes off of her either.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
! …Ah, s-sorry! 
I kept you… waiting.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…A ha ha. I spaced out for a second. 
That's no good! Gotta get back in the groove!

Lightly slapping both of her cheeks, Win Variation got back 
into her groove and took off running—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah, keh—!
But both her pacing and breathing fell apart come the 2nd lap. What's more, she wasn't running with as much spirit as she was a few days ago. She wasn't back in the groove at all.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, damn it… Don't think about it, don't!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
No, I'm… different!! 
I… I need to focus, focus!!
…She was struggling. It looked like she couldn't find the strength to run well. That said, it didn't look like she was hurt. This was…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Tch… aaaaaaaaaaagh!!

Even if she wasn't hurt, I had a bad feeling about it. 
Even if it was a slim chance, I decided to stop her.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah… 
I'm sorry… I just…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…I wasn't planning this! I'm not like this usually! 
I always try my—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Huh… N-no, not at all. 
But, why'd you ask?
choice_data_list: It looked like you were enduring something.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? N-nothing… of the sort! 
Well, my condition is… I feel like I can keep going!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Well, I just… couldn't… concentrate that well. Because of that you saw something strange with my running… I'm sorry.
choice_data_list: Well, there were a bunch of journalists—

text_block_list.text: She might've not calmed down yet, so I called out to her. Everyone's left already, and it's quiet around here. The girl they were getting info on wasn't here either.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Who cares about her!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…U-um… 
I… I just… I…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …I-I'm sorry!
She bowed her head and then ran away. Before she ran away, I saw she was about to cry. Her expression was… really heart-breaking… I couldn't leave her alone.
